quote: He leaves because there is no hope.
The Ring will not save Gondor. It has only the power to destroy. Please, Iet me go.
Boromir was loyal to me! Not some wizard's pupil.
Arwen. There is nothing for you here, only death.
You stink of horse. The Man...
Murderer' they called us. They cursed us and drove us away.
One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them, one ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.
I can't! I can't! I can't manage the Ring, Sam. It's such a weight to carry. It's such a weight.
There is one passage. It leads into the mountains. But they will not get far. The Uruk-hai are too many.
We do not come to treat with Sauron, faithless and accursed. Tell your master this. The armies of Mordor must disband. He is to depart these lands, never to return.
Grond will breach it! Bring out the wolf's head.
Wait. This creature is bound to me. And I to him. He is our guide. Please......Iet me go down to him.
Go back to the abyss! Fall into the nothingness that awaits you and your master!
The Ring will not save Gondor. It has only the power to destroy. Please, Iet me go.
